headline: Street Optimism Builds Around Walmart Inc. (WMT)
summary: Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) is among the best stocks in each sector in 2026. On February 20, TheFly reported that Bernstein lifted the price target on Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) to $134, up from $129, and maintained an Outperform rating. The firm highlighted the company’s modest beat in the fourth quarter, while advising to buy the company’s shares […]

headline: Amazon Tops Walmart As Revenue Leader While AI Shift Reshapes Valuation Story
summary: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) has surpassed Walmart to become the largest U.S. company by annual revenue, taking the top spot on the Fortune 500. At the same time, AI research leader David Luan is departing, with Peter Desantis stepping in to oversee Amazon’s AI research efforts. These developments coincide with Amazon’s move to integrate its AGI division more closely with AWS. For investors watching Amazon.com at a share price of $210.63, this revenue milestone highlights how far the company...
